awards.description: PURPOSE AND ACTIVITIES ARE TO BUILD TRIBAL CAPACITY TO DEVELOP AND MANAGE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT PROGRAM DEVELOP AN ETEP COMMUNITY OUTREACH NETWORK WITH REGIONAL ORGANIZATIONS. ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES ARE TO DEVELOP ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM TECHNICAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE CAPABILITIES; PRODUCE AN EPA TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PLAN AND COMMUNITY ENVIRONMENTAL OUTREACH MATERIALS; AND LEARN FROM PEER TO PEER MEETINGS AND ENVIRONMENTAL TRAININGS. INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE IGIUGIG VILLAGE AND TRIBAL MEMBERS

DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE IGIUGIG VILLAGE IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3. BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4. BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5. BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES; CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; CONDUCTING SOURCE SEPARATION AND RESOURCE RECOVERY ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATER, AIR, AND WASTE; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; AND DEVELOPING SPILL RESPONSE CAPABILITIES.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE IGIUGIG VILLAGE, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; RECYCLING AND WASTE ACTIVITY REPORTS; AND AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY.
NEXT GENERATION MHK RIVER POWER SYSTEM, OPTIMIZED FOR PERFORMANCE, DURABILITY AND SURVIVABILITY
A RESILIENT AND AUTONOMOUS MICROGRID POWERED BY MARINE RENEWABLE ENERGY FOR THE VILLAGE OF IGIUGIG, ALASKA
